item.title: 阅读杰罗姆·鲍威尔关于司法部大陪审团传票的声明
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔就司法部向美联储发出大陪审团传票的完整声明，于1月11日晚间发布：【原文：Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell’s full statement on the Justice Department serving the Fed with grand jury subpoenas, issued the evening of Jan. 11:】

item.title: 澳大利亚宣布战略储备关键矿产清单
item.description: 澳大利亚计划从国内矿业公司采购并储备对国防和尖端技术至关重要的矿产资源，以助力强化全球供应链体系。【原文：Australia plans to buy and stockpile minerals essential for defense and advanced technologies from domestic mining companies to help strengthen global supply chains.】

item.title: 欧盟与南方共同市场达成贸易协定，挑战特朗普的保护主义
item.description: 欧盟与南方共同市场终于达成了他们长期寻求的贸易协定，并发表了一份政治声明——在25年前谈判开始时，几乎无人能预见这一幕。【原文：The European Union and Mercosur have delivered their long-sought trade pact, along with a political statement few could have imagined when talks began 25 years ago.】

item.title: 澳大利亚11月家庭支出超预期
item.description: 澳大利亚11月家庭支出增速超出预期，表明即便通胀和借贷成本居高不下，消费者对其财务状况仍充满信心。【原文：Australia’s household spending rose at a faster-than-expected pace in November, indicating consumers are feeling confident about their finances even as inflation and borrowing costs remain elevated.】

item.title: 《纽约时报》称检方对美联储主席鲍威尔启动刑事调查
item.description: 据《纽约时报》援引知情官员的消息报道，联邦检察官已就美联储主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔展开刑事调查，调查内容涉及该央行对其华盛顿特区总部的翻修工程。【原文：Federal prosecutors have opened a criminal investigation into Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell over the central bank’s renovation of its Washington, DC, headquarters, the New York Times reported, citing officials briefed on the situation.】

item.title: 英国90年代住房热潮让富家子弟获得最佳工作机会，英国财政研究所称
item.description: 平等运动人士长期以来一直强调，在1990年代末和2000年代初的房地产繁荣时期，英国家庭通过暴富获得了意外之财，并利用这笔财富帮助子女登上房产阶梯。鲜为人知的是，同样的房产财富也帮助这些孩子获得了最佳工作机会。【原文：Equality campaigners have long highlighted how British families who made a fortune during the housing boom of the late 1990s and 2000s used the windfall to give their children a leg up on the property ladder. Less well known is that the same property wealth helped those kids bag the best jobs.】

item.title: 英国预算案公布后，招聘人数以四个月来最快速度下滑
item.description: 英国雇主在12月再次缩减招聘规模，一项备受关注的调查显示，这可能加剧英国央行对就业市场疲软的担忧。【原文：UK employers cut back their hiring again in December, according to a closely watched survey that is likely to add to the Bank of England’s concerns about a weakening jobs market.】

item.title: 文博本季度有望跃升4%，得益于政策支持与资金流入
item.description: 据当地分析师称，在政府抑制汇率波动的措施以及外国资本大量涌入本土股市的支撑下，韩元本季度有望实现4%的升值。【原文：The South Korean won is on track for a 4% gain this quarter, supported by government measures to curb volatility and a flood of foreign capital into local stocks, according to local analysts.】

item.title: 特朗普推动美联储变革，全球利率路径分化
item.description: 随着各国央行在特朗普执政第二年引发的经济迷雾中摸索前行，全球利率分化趋势即将显现。【原文：A spell of global interest-rate divergence is in store as central banks feel their way through the economic fog stoked by Donald Trump’s second year at the White House.】

item.title: 高盛预测美国经济强劲增长，通胀温和，美联储将降息两次
item.description: 高盛集团经济学家表示，今年美国经济将受益于减税、实际工资增长和财富增加，同时通胀将趋于温和。【原文：The US economy this year will get a boost from tax cuts, real wage gains and rising wealth, while inflation will moderate, according to economists at Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 人民币汇率看涨情绪升温，美元对冲成本触及三年低点
item.description: 对中国人民币的乐观情绪正蔓延至对冲活动领域，内地投资者为防范美元可能贬值而需支付的成本已降至三年低点。【原文：Growing optimism toward the Chinese yuan is spreading into hedging activities, with the cost that mainland investors have to pay to guard against possible dollar losses falling to a three-year low.】

item.title: 金价因美国就业数据疲软及伊朗局势紧张创历史新高
item.description: 美国就业数据公布后，市场对美国进一步降息的预期保持不变，金价因此攀升至历史新高；与此同时，伊朗抗议活动持续升级，使地缘政治紧张局势居高不下。【原文：Gold rose to a record high after US jobs data left expectations for additional US interest-rate cuts intact, while intensifying protests in Iran kept geopolitical tensions elevated.】

item.title: Netflix开启其宏大的播客实验
item.description: 奈飞进军播客领域是该平台发展历程中的重要时刻——对播客行业而言更是具有深远意义的重大事件。【原文：Netflix’s embrace of podcasting is a major moment for the service -- and a bigger one for the podcast industry】

item.title: Meta因澳大利亚儿童社交媒体禁令关闭55万账户
item.description: Meta Platforms公司表示，为遵守澳大利亚针对儿童实施的具有里程碑意义的社交媒体禁令，该公司已在该国关闭近55万个账户。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. said it has shut down almost 550,000 accounts in Australia to comply with the country’s landmark social media ban for children.】

item.title: 油价延续涨势，伊朗抗议活动引发供应中断担忧
item.description: 油价连续第三日上涨，因伊朗抗议活动升级威胁到欧佩克第四大产油国的供应。【原文：Oil rose for a third day, as escalating protests in Iran threatened supply from OPEC’s fourth-biggest producer.】

item.title: 麦格理最新数据中心投资押注德国初创企业
item.description: 麦格理集团正向德国数据中心基础设施初创企业Polarise GmbH提供高达1.17亿欧元（约合1.36亿美元）的贷款，该行业由债务驱动的繁荣态势将持续至2026年。【原文：Macquarie Group Ltd. is lending as much as €117 million ($136 million) to German data center infrastructure startup Polarise GmbH, as a debt-fueled boom in the sector continues into 2026.】

item.title: 中国私募先驱合普面临回报与接班疑虑
item.description: 多年来，方锋磊一直是华尔街在中国首选的解决者——作为高盛集团等重量级机构的合作伙伴，他打造了亚洲最杰出的私募股权公司之一。【原文：For years, Fang Fenglei was Wall Street’s go-to fixer in China — a partner to heavyweights like Goldman Sachs Group Inc. who built one of Asia’s most prominent private equity firms.】

item.title: 奥维通完成6.16亿美元融资后即将登陆香港市场
item.description: 香港即将迎来又一家芯片设计公司上市，随着中国人工智能企业竞相涌入这个金融中心筹集扩张资金，一股浪潮正在形成。【原文：Hong Kong is set to add another chip designer to its bourse, as a wave of Chinese artificial-intelligence companies races to tap capital in the financial hub for expansion.】

item.title: 亚洲股市有望跟随美股涨势，油价成焦点：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市周五早盘有望上涨，此前美国就业数据推动股市创下新高。投资者还密切关注油价走势，因伊朗抗议活动持续升级。【原文：Asian equities were poised to climb in early trading after US jobs data supported new highs for stocks on Friday. Investors were also focused on oil prices as protests in Iran intensified.】

item.title: 中美颠覆全球剧本，资本流动逆转
item.description:
随着美国逐步撤离，中国正再次向全球分散资本，促使世界其他国家面对与两大超级大国经济关系发生根本性转变的局面。【原文：

As the US draws back, China is again dispersing capital globally, leading the rest of the world to confront a fundamental change in their economic relationships with both superpowers.  

】

item.title: Anthropic为医疗领域新增面向医生和患者的功能
item.description: Anthropic公司正致力于让患者和临床医生更便捷地使用其人工智能聊天机器人获取医疗信息，这是该公司进军利润丰厚的医疗保健领域的重要举措。这家总部位于旧金山的企业周日宣布，其Claude产品将推出符合《健康保险携带与责任法案》（HIPAA）的新医疗服务，医院、医疗服务提供者和消费者均可使用该服务处理受保护的健康数据。 Anthropic h【原文：Anthropic is making it easier for patients and clinicians to use its artificial intelligence chatbot to access medical information, part of a broader push into the lucrative health care sector. The San Francisco-based company on Sunday said that its Claude product is launching a new health care offering that is compliant with the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act, or HIPAA, and can be used by hospitals, medical providers and consumers to field protected health data. Anthropic h】

item.title: 美国东部纽约1月中旬将迎寒潮，西部则转暖
item.description: 美国气候预测中心表示，1月中旬美国西部地区预计将出现温暖干燥的天气，而中部和东部地区则将转凉。随着芝加哥至纽约等人口稠密城市感受到寒意，这可能推动能源需求上升。【原文：The middle of January is looking to be warm and dry in the western US and cooler in central and eastern parts of the country, which may drive energy demand as the densely populated cities from Chicago to New York feel the chill, the US Climate Prediction Center said.】

item.title: 债券交易员对2026年的重大押注因美国就业增长疲软而得到验证
item.description: 债券投资者对美联储政策走向及2026年国债市场的整体押注，似乎仍有发展空间。【原文：Bond investors’ overarching wager on the path of the Federal Reserve and the Treasuries market in 2026 looks like it has room to run.】

item.title: 安全初创公司Torq以12亿美元估值完成融资
item.description: 以色列网络安全初创公司Torq计划于周日宣布完成1.4亿美元融资，公司估值由此升至12亿美元。【原文：The Israeli cybersecurity startup Torq is planning to announce Sunday that it has closed a $140 million funding round, raising its valuation to $1.2 billion.】

item.title: 乌克兰袭击里海俄罗斯石油钻井平台
item.description: 乌克兰于夜间袭击了俄罗斯石油巨头卢克石油公司在里海拥有的三座钻井平台，此举旨在削弱俄罗斯为战争提供资金的经济能力。【原文：Ukraine overnight targeted three drilling platforms in the Caspian Sea owned by Russian oil major Lukoil in the latest move to weaken Russia’s economic capacity to fund its war effort.】

item.title: 特朗普公司加紧布局沙特地产，沙特王储开放市场
item.description: 特朗普集团与奢侈地产开发商达尔环球公司正启动在沙特阿拉伯价值100亿美元的房地产项目销售，旨在借势即将出台的新规——该政策将放宽外资投资限制。【原文：The Trump Organization and luxury developer Dar Global Plc are kicking off sales at real estate projects in Saudi Arabia valued at $10 billion, seeking to capitalize on new rules that will soon make it easier for foreigners to invest.】

item.title: 沃尔玛携手谷歌母公司Alphabet，在Gemini平台推出人工智能辅助购物服务
item.description: 沃尔玛公司正与谷歌母公司Alphabet合作，在谷歌Gemini平台上推出人工智能增强型购物服务——这是该零售商竞相将该技术应用于其整个运营体系的一部分。【原文：Walmart Inc. is partnering with Alphabet Inc. to offer AI-enhanced shopping on Google’s Gemini platform — part of the retailer’s race to apply the technology across its operations.】

item.title: “雄鹰队长”惨败事件为风险管理敲响警钟
item.description: 圣诞节期间让一位成功的期权交易员破产的，并非什么"只活一次"的冲动交易，而是一种流传数百年的赌博策略——这种策略在业余二十一点玩家中颇受欢迎。【原文：It wasn’t some YOLO trade that took down a successful options trader over Christmas, but a centuries-old gambling strategy popular with amateur blackjack players.】

item.title: 七大巨头的股市霸权显露裂痕
item.description: 近年来，为战胜市场，许多投资者采取了一种简单策略：大量买入美国最大科技股。【原文：To beat the market in recent years, many investors applied a simple strategy: Load up on the biggest US technology stocks.】

item.title: 马斯克旗下Grok AI因涉及色情图像在印尼、马来西亚遭封禁
item.description: 印度尼西亚和马来西亚上周末限制了对埃隆·马斯克旗下Grok人工智能系统的访问，成为首个因该系统生成色情内容而禁止使用该人工智能系统的国家。【原文：Indonesia and Malaysia restricted access to Elon Musk’s Grok AI over the weekend, becoming the first countries to ban the artificial intelligence system over its generation of sexual content.】
